Title: Why We Fight
Plot: The battle with New Bern ensues, with Jericho residents out-manned and out-gunned, but not outsmarted. Jericho gains the upper hand but suffers a significant casualty. A friend of Jake's sends help from an unexpected source.
GuestStars: Kassim Osgood, Patrick E. Wymore, Emily Swallow, David Huddleston, Titus Welliver, Tripp Pickell, Daniel Benzali
